name: Project 39
description:
Project 39 - A fresh start

Over the past like 3 months I have essentially abandoned Person Proj. Maps weren't made in the same style, I was losing the update schedule, and then I switched PC's and lost the project, and I don't know how to get it back. But, all this is probably for the better, because I've started the next project, and it's going to be like a remake. It'll still suck, but a little less bad.

PBA1 is now out!
